key_takeaways: Solution: Become a deal scout for emerging managers using platforms like AngelList (Difficulty: intermediate)

Strategy: Deal scouting for emerging fund managers to earn carry without capital investment
Startup Opportunity: Deal scouting service connecting networked individuals with emerging fund managers (Target: Recent graduates, builders in internet communities)
